column1: Jand Tehsil(in Punjabi جنڈ  تحصیل ) is a tehsil of Attock District in Punjab Province of  Pakistan.
At the south-west of District Attock
column2: 100 km away from Islamabad is located Jand City. This is a border city between KPK and Punjab. There is the  [Indus]] river about 5 km away from Jand City. It is surrounded by five towns namely Pari

column1: The tehsil is administratively subdivided into 15 union councils including Jand. Names of remaining are:
